meanings.sent1: She ensured her homework was complete before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: The lock on the door ensured their safety at night.
meanings.sent3: The cat ensured the mouse had no chance of escape.
meanings.sent4: His confident tone ensured his victory in the debate.
meanings.sent5: The umbrella ensured they stayed dry during the storm.

meanings.sent1: The warranty ensured the product could be replaced if needed.
meanings.sent2: His hard work ensured his promotion within the company.
meanings.sent3: The superhero ensured the city was always protected from harm.
meanings.sent4: Her smile ensured a warm welcome wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The password ensured only authorized users could access the system.

meanings.sent1: The life jacket ensured his safety while swimming in the lake.
meanings.sent2: The security guard ensured the building was secure at all times.
meanings.sent3: The lucky charm ensured she would have a great day.
meanings.sent4: The shield ensured he was protected from the enemy's arrows.
meanings.sent5: The insurance policy ensured they would be covered in case of an accident.
